articles.title: 'American Idol' winner Laine Hardy arrested by LSU police, accused of bugging student's room - USA TODAY
articles.description: "American Idol" Season 17 winner Laine Hardy is accused of placing a voice-activated audio recorder in a student's room on LSU's campus.
articles.content:
"American Idol" Season 17 winnerLaine Hardy was arrested Friday by the Louisiana State University Police Department after the singer was accused of bugging a student's room with a recording device.

articles.content:
A solar eclipse occurs when the Moon passes between the Sun and Earth and casts its shadow on Earth. Credit: NASAs Scientific Visualization Studio
